<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 77</row>

**Prerequisites**
[vivacious speed](/Classes.aspx?ID=15)

**Requirements**
You have panache.

</column>

---

You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you. You Stride. At any point along your movement, you leave an afterimage of yourself behind. Alternatively, you can stop moving and send your afterimage forward instead, up to the remainder of your Speed. A creature that spends actions to engage with your afterimage can attempt to disbelieve it with a Will save against your class DC. Once an enemy has disbelieved any of your afterimages, they are temporarily immune to all of your Vivacious Afterimages for 10 minutes. As long as a creature has not disbelieved the afterimage, the afterimage counts as a creature for flanking. The afterimage lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until you use Vivacious Afterimage again, whichever comes first.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4.

**Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748), [Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749), [Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
